title: Here's a list of 20 articles that review various aspects of Natural Language Processing (NLP) research up to 2021. These articles cover a range of topics including foundational concepts, recent advancements, and specific subfields within NLP
**"A Survey of the State of the Art in Natural Language Generation: Core tasks, applications and evaluation"** by Albert Gatt and Emiel Krahmer
**"Attention Is All You Need"** by Ashish Vaswani et al
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** by Jacob Devlin et al
**"A Survey on Recent Advances in Named Entity Recognition from Deep Learning models"** by Yadav
**"A Comprehensive Review on Word Embeddings: Recent Advances and Future Challenges"** by Wang, Wei, et al
**"A Survey on Text Classification: From Shallow to Deep Learning"** by Minaee, Shervin, et al
**"A Survey on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and New Frontiers"** by Chen, Hongshen, et al
**"A Survey of Evaluation Metrics Used for NLG Systems"** by Belz, Anja, and Ehud Reiter
**"A Survey of Cross-lingual Word Embedding Models"** by Ruder

author.literal: **"A Survey on Neural Machine Translation"** by Bahar, Parnia, Tobias Bieschke, and Hermann Ney

title: **"A Survey of Deep Learning Techniques for Neural Machine Translation"** by Yang, Zhaopeng, et al
**"A Survey of Recent Advances in Hierarchical Text Classification"** by Kowsari, Kamran, et al
**"A Survey of Active Learning for Natural Language Processing"** by Settles, Burr
**"A Survey on Sentiment Analysis: From Opinion Mining to Emotion Recognition"** by Zhang
**"A Survey of the Usages of Deep Learning in Natural Language Processing"** by Young, Tom, et al
**"A Survey on Knowledge Graphs: Representation, Acquisition, and Applications"** by Hogan, Aidan, et al

title: **"A Survey of Deep Learning Methods for Relation Extraction"** by Yao, Linyong, et al

These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the state of NLP research, covering foundational models, recent advancements, and specific applications. They should give you a solid grounding in the field and its current trends up to
